font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular” css=”.vc_custom_1669455400434{margin-top: 17px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 22px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We are a leading proprietary trading firm based in London (UK), specializing in supporting experienced prop traders.
Our commitment is to help traders excel and provide the tools and capital they need to compete in a marketplace defined by change and disruption.
We are focused on seeking out trading and investment opportunities to grow our capital in the global financial markets.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:30%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1669350766714{padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”22828″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://youtu.be/fj1gqZydUDM” el_class=”display-mobile” css=”.vc_custom_1669619766916{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1669352207074{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: #1b1b30 !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”section-container”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1669352200735{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”People & Technology” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular”][vc_custom_heading text=”Lux was formed to bring together high calibre people, innovative and quantitative modeling, and cutting-edge technology to discover trading and investment opportunities around the globe.
We are a fully staffed, well-capitalized firm that allows traders to focus on the execution, analysis, and growth of their strategies. Our in-house trade, and risk desk, development team, technology staff, and back-office ensure every step of the trade life-cycle is receiving professional attention.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:30%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1668852292617{padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”22101″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”#” el_class=”border-radius-30″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1669352480773{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: #0d0d23 !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”section-container”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”hide-mobile” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1669619915651{margin-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”22111″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://youtu.be/fj1gqZydUDM”%5D%5B/vc_column_inner%5D%5Bvc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1669352407845{padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Experience” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular” css=”.vc_custom_1669455475491{margin-top: 10px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Lux was founded by experienced asset managers with a global network of experienced financial experts, system developers and fund managers who know that the financial market is unpredictable. Based on this insight we have developed a set of rules and principles that enable consistently successful trading. Our team has a consistent track record including managing trading desks and are specialists in taking risks to generate above-average returns.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:30%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”.chillaxsemibold”][vc_single_image image=”22111″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://youtu.be/fj1gqZydUDM” el_class=”display-mobile” css=”.vc_custom_1669619990653{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1669529379765{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: #141429 !important;}” el_class=”meet-our-mentor”][vc_column el_class=”section-container”][vc_custom_heading text=”Meet Our Mentors” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:60px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669455487541{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”chillaxregular”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1670239605953{margin-top: 25px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”22141″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”#” el_class=”bruno”][vc_custom_heading text=”Bruno Perinelli” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular” css=”.vc_custom_1669455498473{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Bruno is an Argentinian Finance expert based in Buenos Aires. With many years of experience in the capital markets, he provides insides to the European and American markets.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:24px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1670239334272{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”22140″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”#” css=”.vc_custom_1669266705862{margin-top: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Jake Torres” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular” css=”.vc_custom_1669455514072{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Jake is a Philippines-based mentor and financial analyst. He’s an outstanding trading psychology coach and he provides our insights to the Asian markets.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:24px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1670239395170{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1669117054372{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-right: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;padding-left: 90px !important;background-image: url(https://luxtradingfirm.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/b.jpg?id=22168) !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”section-container”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1669112107177{padding-right: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner el_class=”hide-mobile” width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1669620177120{margin-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”22122″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://youtu.be/fj1gqZydUDM” el_class=”border-radius-30″ css=”.vc_custom_1669277193858{padding-right: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1669111625293{padding-right: 30px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Founders” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”chillaxregular” css=”.vc_custom_1669455527907{margin-top: 35px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”The founders of Lux Trading are more than 30 year veterans of the commodity, futures, and foreign exchange markets.
We have been responsible for currency strategy, and trading for several high profile clients, who are allocated within the institutional and hedge fund space. We have managed an alpha driven portfolio of G10 currencies, as well as a number of other hedging programs and strategies.
Having started trading commodities and futures on the ICE, LME, CME, CBOT, NYMEX and COMEX in the early ’90s, we have gained the expertise to manage risk through times of calm, as well as times of extreme market stress.
Our years of experience have helped us to model and analyze risk in both short and long-term time horizons, studying market fundamentals, and correlations across currencies.
With that experience we have dedicated ourselves to growing our firm, finding new talent, and helping traders reach their full potential.
Thank you for taking the time to learn about us.
The Founders of Lux Trading Firm” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:30%20px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”.chillaxsemibold”][vc_single_image image=”22122″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://youtu.be/fj1gqZydUDM” el_class=”border-radius-30 display-mobile” css=”.vc_custom_1669620218173{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1669529451323{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: #0d0d23 !important;}” el_class=”traders-think”][vc_column el_class=”section-container”][vc_row_inner gap=”20″][vc_column_inner el_class=”Trustpilot” width=”3/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1669352757480{padding-right: 15px !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Don’t just take our word for it! See what our traders think.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669455538507{border-bottom-width: 20px !important;}”
